content: the drd diagnostic repair drone is from the scifi tv show *farscape* that aired on the scifi channel from 1999-2003 with a finale in 2004 from the farscape encyclopedia project 1 **diagnostic repair drones** or **drd**s are small robots that move around leviathans they are built by the leviathan as it grows the drds are extensions of the leviathans consciousness when the pilot is not in control of them because of this drds can be used by crew members to communicate directly with a leviathan should the pilot be incapacitated the drds perform various functions including ship repairs searching for lost items and defensive combat using built-in lasers just a quick note that this pattern hasn t been tested please let me know if you notice any typos or anything that s just not right my drd pattern is available for free but if you like it please consider sending me a donation via paypal to trystan830@gmail com to show your appreciation thanks 1 http //farscape wikia com/wiki/farscape_encyclopedia_project main_page
